voice.personality: Promise Farm comes across as a helpful, approachable neighbor who happens to own a beautiful property. They balance rustic charm with modern convenience while emphasizing that beautiful weddings don't require rigid rules or extravagant budgets.
do: Use warm, sensory language that evokes the countryside setting
Emphasize flexibility and freedom of choice for vendors and catering
Address the reader directly using 'you' and 'your' to create personal connection
Mention affordability and value alongside elegance
Include specific natural details (ponds, fields, fresh air, light)
Use testimonials with authentic, enthusiastic quotes from couples
Highlight the Lancaster County location and rural setting
Use checkmark bullets for amenities and features
Refer to the venue as a 'canvas' or 'backdrop' for the couple's story
dont: Use stuffy, formal hospitality language or pretentious terminology
Imply rigid rules or restrictions on vendor choices
Focus exclusively on luxury or high-end positioning
Use pushy sales language or urgency tactics
Overwhelm with industry jargon or wedding planning complexity
Sound corporate or generic like a hotel banquet hall
Use urban-centric language that ignores the rural setting
Suggest that weddings must follow a specific traditional format
Use 'cheap' or imply low quality when discussing affordability

preferred.context: Use instead of 'event' to convey joy
Use instead of 'attendees' to convey warmth
Positions venue as supporting the couple's story
Emphasizes creative freedom and blank-slate potential
Authentic, grounded vibe without being sloppy

prohibited.reason: Implies low quality rather than good value
Suggests exclusivity and high cost contrary to accessible positioning
Implies rigid bundles rather than customizable choices
Suggests generic hotel feel rather than unique farm setting
Brand emphasizes vendor freedom and personalization

byStage.tone: warm and personal, like a letter from a friend

patterns.name: Sensory Setting Descriptions
patterns.description: Sentences that evoke the physical experience of being at the farm
examples: Promise Farm sits quietly in the hills of Lancaster County, surrounded by open fields and the easy beauty of the countryside.
It's bright, comfortable, and ready to host both intimate gatherings and large celebrations.

patterns.name: You-Centered Statements
patterns.description: Direct address emphasizing personal choice and customization
examples: You can plan a meaningful celebration that feels completely your own.
You're welcome to choose the vendors that fit your style and budget.

patterns.name: Short Punchy Hooks
patterns.description: Brief statements that capture the essence of the venue
examples: Promise Farm is where beautiful moments unfold.
The Perfect Canvas for Your Wedding Day.

patterns.name: Feature Bullets with Icons
patterns.description: Visual list format using checkmarks or icons for amenities
examples:  Air conditioned and heated barn, climate-controlled for year-round comfort
 Outdoor ceremony area with sweeping countryside views

visual.imageryStyle: Elegant, natural light photography with warm tones. Focus on candid moments and emotional connections.
